resources.string: Please take a moment to set your password below. This will ensure that your coins are secure in the unfortunate event that someone steals or hacks your phone. We recommend using a few words that you are sure to remember and that only you will know.\n\nOnce you\'ve set your password, DO NOT FORGET IT! You will not be able to spend your coins without it.

Please also take a moment to provide your name below. This value is only stored on your device and, if provided, persons sending you coins will not need to type your name every time they transact with you. We suggest you use your first name, or the name you commonly use.
This is your home screen where you can navigate between all of your different wallets. Click the + icon above to begin adding currencies to your ziftrWALLET.

ziftrWALLET streamlines the process of sending, receiving and storing different types of cryptocurrency.

 ziftrWALLET was created by the talented entrepreneurs, software developers and marketers behind Ziftr, a suite of shopping tools that has helped more than 2 million users find the best deals at their favorite online retailers.

 To learn more about Ziftr, go to www.ziftr.com.

 Coming Soon: ziftrCOIN!

 ziftrCOIN, the first digital currency developed for online shoppers, aims to revolutionize shopping by putting cryptocurrency into the hands of consumers and enabling them to conduct simple, secure transactions at their favorite online retailers.

 To learn more about ziftrCOIN, go to www.ziftrCOIN.com.

ZiftrWallet is a decentralized mobile wallet in that addresses and keys are stored on your phone. This way your wallet is safe from server-side attacks, however it is necessary for the user to keep the phone physically secure. 

Be wary of allowing untrusted people or apps access to your phone and be sure to set your password. 

It is recommended to store a spendable amount of cryptocurrency on ziftrWallet rather than your entire balance. 

WARNING: Remember to transfer your coins to other wallets before uninstalling.
No more wallets to add! Ensure you have wifi for this list to populate.
This software uses ZXing under the Apache 2 license http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
This will enable "testnet" coins and advanced options that may compromise wallet security and/or device performance. Use at your own risk! \n\nAre you sure you want to activate debug mode?

Why is there a fee?\n\nThis fee is NOT paid to Ziftr. The fee goes to the miner that secures your transaction as a reward for their service. This is standard for all cryptocurrency applications. Without it, your transaction would likely stay as pending for an inconvenient length of time.
The passwords you entered don\'t match. Your previous password is still in place.
The password you entered doesn\'t match your previous password. Your previous password is still in place.
You are about to delete your wallet data! Ensure you have your wallet exported or you will lose all your coins!
Are you sure you want to deactivate this wallet? This will not actually delete any of your stored data, and you can reactivate it at any time.
Addresses cannot be deleted once they are created. Are you sure?
The passwords entered don\'t match. Please try again.
Your wallet is already encrypted with an older password. Enter your old password.
Encryption has been removed. Please try setting your password again.
Incorrect password. Your wallet is still encrypted with your old password.
There was a fatal error with wallet encryption. Please backup your wallet files and reinstall the application.
There was an error reading your wallet files. You must restart the application.
You cannot enter a blank name. Name can be disabled from the settings menu.
There was an error in the scanned data.
The scanned address is not valid.
The address is not formatted correctly. Please try again.
The current wallet does not have enough coins to send the amount requested.

There was an error with your request. 
%1$s 
Amount: %2$s 
Fee %3$s 
Address %4$s.

The message and amount fields are encoded into the QRcode and should be used if you wish to pre-fill a message and amount for the scanning user\'s wallet. These are optional and are not saved when loading an address from the address book.
You must activate %1$s and add coins to your wallet before you can send to an address.
